title: What is the best way to approach to the scientific area? - Quora

response.answer_text: Buy a big set of LEGO Techics. Assemble it. If you enjoyed the process and it did not take more than 2 hours, you are good to go. Also, read some books about the peopke in your favourit field of science. Finally you can find people around you, either professional or amateurs. Like astronomers, chemists, engineers, programmers. Try to talk with them, invite them for a coffee and ask them about science, their education, jobs, desire. Be friendly and they will also be with you.
